caption: This is a wonderful epic series clip. The background of it is in middle age. At a dining table, a family is having a meal. A shorter man is the target of some jokes from a few others, but he doesn't seem to mind and continues to sit there, engaging in conversation and eating.Afterward, in a room, two women meet. There lies on a bed a man who is unconscious. These two women are conversing, and their tone is filled with sadness. They talk for a long time until one of the women eventually leaves.In a city, a man is tending to a fire and working on blacksmithing. Nearby, two men are engaged in conversation. One man is talking to the others. Meanwhile, in another room, a young girl is packing her belongings.
